name: Adventures of Teardrop
description:
This is a very quick 2D platformer game where you play as a teardrop trying to collect all the gems. Be careful though as there are plenty of obstacles in the way! 

CONTROLS:
A and D to move
Spacebar to jump
Left click to restart (when prompted)

Small tip, you can run over one-block-sized gaps.

I hope you enjoy!
